ur_rna.Utilities.swing

Interface SimpleDocumentListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, java.util.EventListener
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface SimpleDocumentListener
extends javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
    Similar to TextDocListener, but this is lighter weight and allows for lambda syntax. Usage: field.getDocument().addDocumentListener((SimpleDocumentListener) e -> { // handler code });
